website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, figure-flattering jumpsuit that is dressy enough for weddings and other events.
pros: Available in a variety of bright patterns and colors
Easy to dress up or down
Shoulder ties come undone, allowing you to adjust the fit
Long inseam and shorter outseam create a flattering shape
cons: Some lighter patterns may be a touch see-through

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5ft... us shorties can’t usually rock a jumpsuit but this one hit me in all the right places!!! So glad I went out of my comfort zone and purchased because I received so many compliments!!! I’m 5ft and 135lbs for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for spring and summer!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this pantsuit/romper! It is a light flowy material that fits true to size! I am about 185lbs and 5'7" and got a medium. The colors are beautiful shades of green. This is perfect for just a summer day or for a summer wedding if you are a guest!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this! Such a cute jumpsuit and perfect for summer. You can dress it up with heels or down with sandals. It’s exactly like the picture! I’m 5’8” and 170. I got the XL and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen F.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this piece because it was a GREAT price and it lived up to them! I am always a little worried that prints don't look as great in person as they do in the photos, and I was pleasantly surprised by this one. The ties being functional is a HUGE plus (Great for nursing moms AND for several different bust sizes) It isn't lined, so nude underwear is a must. Glad I got it in two colors and I'm considering a third! I'm 5'6" and 138lbs. I got the Medium. Probably could have gone with the small, but I like the roomier fit.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this romper and will be ordering in more colors! I’m 5”5” and 155 pounds and ordered a medium
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hatle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’8”, 200lbs, 40D and bought the XXL. Fits great, cool material great for Florida! I love that the straps tie which is great for those of different heights.
customer_reviews.author: robin snell

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3" - 156 lbs - bought a large and it fits PERFECTLY! so easy to take off to use the restroom too~ which with jumpers/rompers is always a plus. Will be buying in the black and army green as well because this is super cute to dress up with heels or down with flats. LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am so so pleased with this jumpsuit. I was weary of ordering one off of amazon, and I was in a time crunch, so if it didn’t end up being of good quality, I would’ve been out of luck. I got the multicolor leaf print pattern in a size medium. I’m 5’3” and about 130 lbs, and it fits very well, with the longest part of the leg hitting just about my ankles. With heels, it’s perfect. The fabric is of good quality and even right out of the bag, it was barely wrinkled. It’s lightweight and airy, which makes it perfect for your summer outings. I highly recommend this jumpsuit, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: m_og95

customer_reviews.title: Love it :)
customer_reviews.text: Super cute I can’t wait to wear this on our cruise in the spring. I’m 5’4 164lbs I got a large and fits good. Not to tight or big fits just right. I’m very pleased with this. Would love to get this in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly cute! Ive been looking for a jumpsuit that would suit my body for quite some time. I was kind scared to order cause most times jumpsuits fit me weird cause I'm short. I ordered an XL and I'm 5'2 180lbs and it fits great! It's not too long and there is still room to wiggle around. I'm definitely thinking about get other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something a little dressy (without being TOO dressy) for an outdoor wedding rehearsal dinner, so I’m hoping this will be appropriate! It’s very comfortable, and the ties at the shoulders makes it very customizable. The longer inseam is a different look that I’m unsure about, but my daughter says it’s cute, so I’m following her lead. I ordered a navy wide belt to see if that will look good...fingers crossed (FYI I’m 57 years old, 5’5” tall, and about 160#. I ordered a large)
customer_reviews.author: momtime

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but need a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a size Medium based on other reviews. I am 5'8" tall, 150 lbs, and have birthed children and have a bit of a pooch and a biggish butt. The medium fit as far as length and crotch seams, but it was nearly skin tight. I do, however, really like the print and the material is lightweight, which is great for my desert summers. I am returning and hoping the Large size will give me the more baggier fit in the stomach area, to hide the pooch and to allow the material to kind of drape down.
customer_reviews.author: akkeber

customer_reviews.title: Like, but not love
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a cute jumpsuit. I just didn't love it. I am short, under 5 feet. Therefore, the hem doesn't fall at the same place at the model and looks less flattering. It is also a little darker than I imagined. Quality it good for price. Product is great, just a personal choice made it not work out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K. Yoshida

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Print - Definitely worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6 and 170lbs. I ordered a large in the palm leaf print. I might have ordered up a size to better hide my mom tummy BUT this one fit well enough. The fabric is thick enough and printed beautifully. At first glance when I put it on, I thought it was see through but realized that there is a faint pink leaf print in the background that I hadnt noticed before. Super cute! The shoulder straps tie so they are wonderfully customizable as well as the waist band. The length was perfect and I got a lot of compliments on the piece!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Not for new moms
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would work out for an upcoming Hawaii trip especially with all the great reviews. My baby is 6-weeks old and I still have about 20 lbs to lose. This was not flattering on me at all. I don't think sizing up would be the answer either. For reference I'm 5'5 and 160 lbs after having a baby 6-weeks ago. I'm breastfeeding and am currently at a size 36DD. The chest area was the least of my concerns, it was more the waste and thigh area, I felt like I had major camel toe. Not attractive, see photos
customer_reviews.author: Callie Knox

customer_reviews.title: Good for taller ladies!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love. I have a very hard time finding jumpsuits that dont ride up my butt. I'm 5'7.5 with a long torso. Because of the adjustable straps I can wear this a bit lower up top which makes it longer in the torso. Length would be good for most heights because of the cut. Definitely going to buy another one or two. For reference..5'7.5 138-143 pounds (lift weights) Small waist and big legs and bum. This is a size small. Perfect fit but will be removing the pockets to eliminate bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I think I might not be made to wear rompers! This was nice but was too short waisted and unflattering on me. I would say it fits fairly true to size - I'm 5'8", 38C, size 12 and usually wear a L or XL. I got this in an XL and it was just a tad small. The material was also more of a thick, silky, polyester and I was looking more for cotton/casual. It's nice that the top was adjustable depending on how you tied the straps but alas it still gave me the dreaded camel toe and accentuated my hips, sadly it's going back and my romper quest continues.
customer_reviews.author: RachieRach215

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, sleek, classy, and adjustable straps
customer_reviews.text: Just get it! I got the Navy blue and it looks good, feels good. I got this because I was attending a summer wedding, but was a photographer. This made me look nice and classy without looking out of place at the wedding. You can always adjust the shoulder straps. The fabric is great quality and wasn't see-through for Navy blue. I am 5'2" and wearing flats or heels would look good.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering and forgiving fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great style and would look good on all body types, of all ages. I am 37 and I think it looks very classic with trendy edge to it. I am 5'5, 34B, 125 lbs and the Medium fits perfectly. I am going to wear this on vacation and to Easter brunch with a white blazer, very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: MizBex

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous... but I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually have a hard time with jumpers bc I’m 5’ 3”, 36D, 32”waist and 42” hip. I ordered an Xl so I’d have a little wiggle room and I love it!!! Shoulders are adjustable bc of the ties and the waist is roomy but the belt makes it more flattering. It’s light and flowey. Perfect length to wear with low heel or wedges. Can’t wait to wear it in Aruba!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: It was cute for a minute, but this didn't last a day! The material is so cheap. I sat down and the fabric ripped from the crotch then down the inside thigh like paper. So embarrassing to be at a family outing like that. It is beyond repair so I have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Mone'

customer_reviews.title: Better with longer legs??
customer_reviews.text: So cute on the model but I looked truly awful in it. My short legs were drowning in a sea of fabric. It’s cute. But not on me. My hubby actually laughed out loud. Quietly. But still. It was ridiculous on me.
customer_reviews.author: B.K. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’1, 188 lbs, 40inch waist and 42inch bust. I ordered a Large and it was way too small. I love the flowy material nit it’s not stretchy. Although you can’t see it in the picture, the stomach area was really tight and it did not look right. I was hoping I could get a larger size but they don’t have anything bigger other than a large. Super disappointed, although you can’t see it in the picture, the stomach area was really tight and it did not look right. I was hoping I could get a larger size but they don’t have anything bigger other than a large. Super disappointed because it’s such a cute style. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: SNMS

customer_reviews.title: Love this jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance because the other reviews were discouraging, so glad I did! I am 5’3 -127lbs and I got a medium. I typically wear a small but jumpsuits can be awkward. This fits perfect! I have a longer body and have a hard time finding one that doesn’t ride up; this fits amazing and the material is so much nicer than expected. I will pair it with heels for a nice dinner. The top shoulders tie so you can adjust for comfort. Take the minute to iron it and you will see a huge difference. I am ordering this in another color right now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight fabric, cheap but looks chic
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jumpsuit and I absolutely love it. The fabric is light weight and perfect for Cali summer/early fall. I've gotten multiple compliments on it every time I've worn it, which has been basically every weekend since I purchased it. It's super easy to dress it up but also looks great without any additional accessories. Would highly recommend this, just be sure to know your body measurements so that you get a size that fits you loosely. (Written by my wife)
customer_reviews.author: Ben ZW

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in size L in rose color. The color is just as pictured. Beautiful! I love the bow ties on the shoulders and the waist tie completes the look. Unfortunately, I need to exchange it for a larger size. I am typically a size M and the L was a bit too snug for my taste. It fit okay, but the material is not forgiving. So the color and snugness combined makes all cellulite and anything else visible. A darker color would probably be okay in the same size. The material isn’t the greatest—sort of that crinkly plastic feel material (polyester?)—but once on looks classy and stylish! It is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ebboo

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought!
customer_reviews.text: I love this romper! I would have gone with 5 stars, but the material is a bit thin and it comes very wrinkly (quick de-wrinkle setting in the dryer though fixed that part!). I will definitely be buying another one in the future, but will stick with the darker shades to help with it being slightly see-through. I highly recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this. It didn't look anything like the photos and was made out of that crappy cheese cloth fabric that falls apart after one wash and is scratchy. You'd think about $30 is a normal proce range for a decent romper. Save your money, if you want a romper buy one at target.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, classy
customer_reviews.text: There is no zipper, so when you step in, the bust portion has to be able to make it past your hips. I'm a 36, 28, 36, & 5'10" ordered a small, and have to wriggle a bit to get the top of the jumper past my hips, but once that's cleared, the jumper fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne C.

customer_reviews.title: Dressy or casual, perfect wardrobe edition!
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is perfect, for my summer wardrobe. Process was easy...I ordered, it was delivered quickly, quality is very good and pricing excellent. It can be worn for a night out, a concert, or romantic evening. It is very comfortable and fits great. Please check your measurements, against sizing chart (don’t assume sizing, based on what you normally wear). I would definitely order it again
customer_reviews.author: Red Rock Radiance

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.text: I was fairly skeptical about purchasing clothing on amazon without being able to try-on first. I had a lot of concerns about fit/quality. Well, both proved to be great. The fit was exactly as described/expected. (5'6", 118lbs - ordered S). I received so many compliments when I wore this to an event, and I can't wait to wear it more! It was very comfortable and lightweight. The shoulder ties make it super easy to adjust the straps to fit a variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: KM Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jumpsuit! Buy-you won’t regret.
customer_reviews.text: I now own two of these jumpsuits – the cheetah print, and the tropical print. For the record I am 5’ 9”, approximately 170 lbs, athletic build. I often find that jumpsuits only work on people who have perfectly flat stomachs and I am not that person! The cut and fit of this jumpsuit is very flattering, and the shoulder straps are adjustable as well. The fabric is fairly thin but I think ordering this item in a print is advantageous because you don’t see every imperfection on your body. I’m very glad I took a chance on this-love them both. No regrets here!
customer_reviews.author: KNazz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & flattering jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy to wear! I am 5" tall and wear a size large. It fits perfectly, the tie straps as a cute detail, the pockets are amazing (TIP all women's clothes need pockets!) I bought it for a resort vacation and it's lovely for dinner with heels and jewelry, sweet for daytime with sandals. Ladies, there are no buttons or zippers, just an elasticized waist, which makes it super easy to pee! I didn't expect to like this as much as I do! I got the Navy floral print, a nice change from black, not still a little dressy for evening. Comfy and flattering, love this jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Yasui

customer_reviews.title: Just horrible
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this romper. When I got it and attempted to try it on, I found it to be very challenging. It had nothing to do with the size but instead how it was sewn together. The top of the romper did match with the bottom. When I had my legs in the romper, the sides where your arms go in were in the front and back. Someone clearly did not know how to sew when putting this together. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: sara komisarz

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish, cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jumpsuit for a dinner event at a botanical garden. The pattern is beautiful, the fabric is lightweight and flowy. I love the angled cut of the legs. Paired it with some wedge sandals and it was perfect! I got several compliments and will look forward to wearing it again. For reference I'm about 5'3" and 115 lbs, and I got an XS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute jumpsuit !
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’4 and 160 lbs. I ordered a medium and while it fit I liked my clothes a bit loose so I ended up returning it. I loved the material as it was very light and flowy and looked like it was made with good material. The leaves and color are also very vibrant. And it went to above my ankles which was great in the summer time. Bummed the medium didn’t work out for me but will look into getting a large instead.
customer_reviews.author: Anela A

customer_reviews.title: Better off with duct tape
customer_reviews.text: Best description of this sleeveless straps that tie over shoulders didn’t fit around 34DD chest ....it looked like I was trying to wrap a gift w/ too little of wrapping paper & really stiff cheap paper. Fabric one sided pattern looks really bad when moves & shows cheap underside of fabric. If you are more 1-dimensional or don’t move/ covered w/ dB sticky tape might look good?! Also you tie the straps which means they come loose/undone easily & design cut not quality so seems adjustable but IS NOT! Otherwise fit okay, but after all I said that shouldn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute - but too short in torso
customer_reviews.text: I've actually bought this item twice... returned the first one as the print didn't look great on me. Returning the 2nd because it is too short in the torso causing it to ride up between my legs. Yes, the straps are ties and can be made longer, but the region between the elastic waist and the crotch is too short, so adjusting the straps doesn't fix it. It is too bad because it is REALLY cute. I'm a size 12/14, 38H 5'7, and the XL was great if not for that one issue. :(
customer_reviews.author: darby

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED this in your wardrobe!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO CUTE! And very comfortable! Would order 1,000x over and probably will in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it!
customer_reviews.text: All around cute romper... I wanted to love it! The palm leaf fabric was adorable and hid some of my chunky girl imperfections, but the fabric feels like chiffon which I didn't mind, but it was a bit scratchy. I would have dealt with the texture, but unfortunately the romper length ended mid to lower calf which really cuts off a person's height and makes you look extra stubby even with wedges (I'm 5'5/170lbs). I'd say buy it and try it, but it just wasn't for me :(
customer_reviews.author: Meghan McC.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from this long torso, pear shaped gal.
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Not entirely a home run but for the price it’s a good trendy piece to have in my closet. I have a long torso so it has always been a challenge for me to find a romper that fits right. For reference, I’m 5’ 8” 138lbs pear shaped, small chest and I got a size Large. I tried a Medium but returned it for the bigger size so I could have more flow in the butt and legs. The ties on the shoulders help counteract the billow on the top half though I could easily take in the sides of the top if needed. Hopefully I’ll wear it a lot this summer!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dalum

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have never worn a jumpsuit before (I am short, and didn't think it would look good) but this one is great! I'm not in love with the material - I think it would be a little comfier if it were stretchy. It has no stretch to it at all. But it fits great and is flattering. It also seems well made. I am 5'1", 130lbs, athletic build, and got a small.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This romper is SOoooo cute!! It’s lightweight and comfy! It does NOT stretch which is why I gave it 4 stars. If I have to go potty I have to untie it and slip it down. Overall I would buy it again. I also bought a black belt (on amazon) to dress it up a little. I am 5’5 120 lbs and bought an XS which fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty but the material is so thin.
customer_reviews.text: I like this jumpsuit, but I don’t love it. I love the pattern, the fit, the style. However the material is super thin. Thank God I got a darker color because there’s no way I could wear this in a lighter color like white. Also, it would be great if there was a zipper on the side for bathroom purposes. This tying and then untying of the sleeves is gonna be a bear! Cute though! By the way I’m 5’7” 125 lbs and I ordered a Small. It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chevychicky

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough!
customer_reviews.text: Background on me: I am 5' 2", about 150 pounds, and a 36D. I got it in large and it fits perfectly (not too tight or loose, just right). Without any shoes on, the pointed ends do touch the ground, but barely. The material (97% polyester/3% spandex) isn't the softest on the skin, but it's nice/light enough for the summertime wear. The striped one is a little bit see-through, but not that noticeable because the stripes. Looks chic, but is comfortable (yay for pockets!).
customer_reviews.author: L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Breastfeeding friendly, and pockets!
customer_reviews.text: It has pockets!! I was looking for an outfit for a wedding that was breastfeeding friendly and that would fit my 6'2 frame. This jumpsuit did not disappoint. The adjustable shoulder straps completely untie which makes it easy to get the right fit in the torso for us tall gals. Also, because the straps completely untie, feeding a baby is a breeze in this outfit. The fabric is light, breathable and perfect for summer. I'm a little bummed that I can't launder this through the dryer, but other than that, this outfit is perfect and a reasonable addition to my wardrobe. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Short girls dream jumper
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’0 and 150 pounds and bought a large. It fits perfect. I carry more weight in my midsection and it flatters the front and the behind as well. It’s not too long in the length and the straps are able to be untied and adjusted as needed. It’s not too thin or thick , it’s some sort of flowy, polyester kind of material. Not shiny or stretchy. Covers the bra in the back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Cute on
customer_reviews.text: I almost purchased the large based on reviews but glad i didnt as it would have been to large every where. The top is nice because you can adjust if you have a larger bust to loosen. Only thing is it had a slightly strong chemical odor. Otherwise, very cute on. I'm 5'7, 150lbs, 34DD with a short torso. Usually 4-6 in jeans and purchased a medium.
customer_reviews.author: JordanTop Contributor: Anime

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for warmer weather!
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect for the summer! The cut/style is comfortable and the material is very breathable. I purchased the color navy and it's a true, dark navy. It will be perfect to dress up with jewelry and heals for a dinner out or dress down with flip flops--a perfect outfit for vacation! Now I just need the sun to come out and the snow to melt so I can wear it!
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for the Summer
customer_reviews.text: I came across this item through a Blogger. This is a must for the spring and summer! I wear a 36D and size 6/8 in bottoms. I purchased the Medium and it fit just right. The tie shoulder straps are great for appropriate adjustments as needed. The elastic waistband hits at a flattering natural waist. The leg draping lays from diagonally forming the outer left to the inner leg, which honestly gives you the illusion that you're taller when you're wearing heels. The print is quite subtle in person. Not too out there with the palm tree leaves. The print of the leaves is not in awkward places. Going on vacation??? BUY THIS JUMPSUIT.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mary

customer_reviews.title: Slow to deliver but still a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This took forever to deliver which was disappointing. First it was going to be late, then the package was lost. The fabric is rather sheer for the hot pink color. I do like the style & it's nothing like I've ever seen before. I plan to wear this for an upcoming cruise! I ordered my true size & although I'm short it still fits very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Flattering flowly fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the loose fit of this jumpsuit because it still has waist definition. It is longer on me than it is on the model in the picture but that is because I am 5'3. That being said, it is still wearable and not too long. The self tie aspect allows you to control the coverage up top which is great. Only downside is that it is a little see through so nude underwear is necessary with this color.
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price, but check for misprinted pattern
customer_reviews.text: This item fit as expected and was comfortable. I like that the ties on the shoulder are real ties so you can adjust them. But the first one I ordered arrived with a defect in the print of the fabric. There was extra dye where it didn't belong, as if it was misprinted. So I returned that one and reordered, and the second one was fine. This is not the highest quality garment you will ever one, but it will last one summer. I bought it for an island themed party, and it was perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: GLR

customer_reviews.title: Crazy cute-not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this jumper, however- there were several long threads at the bottom and when I put it on TO GO TO A WEDDING I notice a hole in the side by the pocket! If it wasn't for that and the sheer panic it caused as I was needing to walk out the door, I would've given it 5 stars. I had to take it off and stitch the hole before we left-then cut all of the threads while driving to the event. I'm 5'6" 130 lbs and the medium fit perfectly. It didn't ride up and wasn't tight in the waste. I'd buy it if I were you, but look it over carefully before wearing!
customer_reviews.author: Dana R Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful jumpsuit, exactly like the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jumpsuit, love the cut on the bottom, which is a half a circle instead of just straight. Has pockets too, which is awesome in a jumpsuit. Fits as described if you go by measurements. I normally wear an M and am 5’8 - see photo for length (wearing 4 inch heels) replaced the waistband with a belt of my own. Easy to wash, no need to iron (which is a HUGE plus) can wear it straight out of a suitcase as it does not wrinkle! The print is amazing and does not change after washing several times, does not shrink either.
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Loved the leopard, returned the yellow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last fall in leopard and LOVE it. I’ve worn it a handful of times over the last year- it is so flattering and I get endless compliments. So I decided to purchase the yellow this time and it was an immediate return after trying it on. Very unflattering, fit was weird, maybe the sizing or fabric was different... regardless, it was just plain...NO. LOVE one, returned the other.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Almost a Win...
customer_reviews.text: This one ended up going back, but almost worked for me. I loved the palm print so much more in person that I thought I would. The quality of the fabric and the jumpsuit seemed really nice, but the fit just didn't work for me. I'm about a size 14 / 36DDD and bought the XL. Surprisingly, the top fit really well and was very flattering. Unfortunately, it was too snug in the hips and thighs. If it had been just a teensy bit more roomy in that area, I would have kept it, but it just wasn't quite right for me.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great last minute purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jumpsuit last month just days before my sorority’s formal bc I legitimately had nothing to wear, and I’m so pleased with it!! I’m 5’4 and 170 lbs and bought a large. It was a little tight around my hips and thighs but I could still move freely and it was comfortable! It hit about mid-calf on me. The material was pretty breathable considering I was outside dancing for about two and a half hours. I love the tie straps, it made it so easy to slightly adjust the jumpsuit to make it fit perfectly. Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jumpsuit for a vacation weekend in Vegas and it worked perfectly. I did order a size up from my normal. The legs were a little snug in my normal size but were perfect when I sized up. If you have larger athletic legs you might want to size up. I also love that this can be office appropriate with a jacket or sweater. Love the green and am thinking about ordering another one in a different color. I've received a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than an intrauterine
customer_reviews.text: Soooo... I should have ordered a size up to get the effortless floaty look in the photo, but even being a little more fitted this was an excellent purchase. I’ve always wanted to swan about my house in something that feels like pajamas and looks like what a 1950s starlet wears on her day off, drinking vodka tonics and signing large photographs of herself by the pool. If *all* of my clothes could look like Blanche DeVereaux’s bedroom this pandemic would probably be much more exciting. 10 out of 10, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: So, I think it is an adorable romper... if you have the right body shape for it. I wanted to love it so badly but it was a little too loose up top and too tight around my badonk. The elastic waist sat too high so I couldn't pull it down to tighten up the top and give more room to the bottom. I'm sticking with the three stars, though, because it would look cute on the right person. It seemed to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute occasionally outfit, mediocre quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty item. It looks like a dress but feels like a jumpsuit and it has POCKETS! I got it to wear to a rooftop birthday party and felt fab. The quality is as expected for the price. It gets one star off because when mine arrived one of the belt loops was already broken. Fortunately I am somewhat capable with a needle and thread and fixed it easily. Wouldn’t expect it to last too long or through frequent wear/wash. I wasn’t expecting it to though. Happy with purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Conley

customer_reviews.title: Defective stitching
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. The QC dept clearly failed on this one. The rear shoulder strap was ripped. It was barely hanging on by a thread. It actually came apart by merely handling it. Also, no product tag was attached as shown in the photos. Which leads me to question if this product was previously worn?? Gross! Submitting for a refund NOT an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: great material and comfortable for the warm weather and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this outfit. Based on the measurements I went with a large but it was a little snug in the hip area so I ordered an XL and it is perfect and fun! I love the legs of this outfit, the material is also great because it is not sheer and it doesn't seem to wrinkle easily like some materials/outfits you purchase on amazon. Will post a picture! The company was excellent to deal with as far as a return goes, packaging was great!
customer_reviews.author: RPiaz

customer_reviews.title: Not for Long Torsos
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this jumpsuit, but it just wasn't right for my body type and height. I am 5'10" and consistently wear a size 12 and the size I ordered didn't fit very well. I think this would be much cuter on a more petite frame or someone with more curves. I am pretty straight up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Kat in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, flattering, lower quality
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly this fit pretty well for a jumpsuit (I'm 5'11"). I normally wear a size 8-10 and went with the Large based on other reviews and it fit well. The fabric is not see-through but it's not thick either and it wrinkles easily, so be warned if you travel with it! I dressed it up with block heel sandals and turquoise jewelry for a rehearsal dinner I attended and received a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jane

customer_reviews.title: Cute But Too Short
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8, 140 lbs, 36 C, and got this in a medium in black. It fit great everywhere, except it was too short for my torso, which caused it to ride up in the crotch. I had to return it because it was so uncomfortable. It was also a bit unflattering on my rear, it caused my butt to look kind of...long, which is a problem I have when I try to wear jumpsuits. It did not seem see through in the black. I'm debating trying the large, but I have a feeling it will be too big, so I'm probably going to skip it.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great value, cute outfit! Came quickly
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2, 150 and I got a medium and it fit perfectly! Light material and for the price it is a good value, not cheap material. I got the Green multi and it is perfect for my tropical trip coming up! Shipped very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: SharkFIn

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Well made and cute
customer_reviews.text: This is sooooo cute! I can't wait for the weather to get warmer so I can wear it. I'm 5'6 and 138lbs and the medium fits perfectly! I love that the straps tie as I have a long torso so often these outfits don't fit right on me but this one looks great. EDIT: wore this recently on vacation and loved it! Super comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Nessie

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: If you have larger thighs/butt, size up. The material does not have stretch, but the waist has elastic. I’m happy with the olive green color. Overall, I’d say that it’s exactly as I expected for a cheap jumper. I rated 4/5 because I wouldn’t consider it a “must have” item.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Mason

customer_reviews.title: 5’7 — 160 lbs & large worked best!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jumpsuit on a whim because I needed something to wear to a baby shower. It arrived as expected and fit was perfect. I am pear shaped so I ordered a large and it fit in all the right places. I was worried about the bust being too large, but the adjustable tie straps solved any worries that I had. The material is light weight and I would imagine lighter colors may be see through. Overall I plan to purchase this jumpsuit again on other colors. For reference I am 5’7 — 160lbs and I ordered a large.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McK

customer_reviews.title: Thin, see through material.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute style, but the material is see through and a thin, crepe like material. The seams flip out at the bottom and make it look even cheaper. I sized up to a medium and the fit is great, just the material is not. I think getting a darker color would be better or something with a print. It would have been great if it were lined.
customer_reviews.author: babylicious

customer_reviews.title: Cute but thin fabric. Also size up!!
customer_reviews.text: As pictured and very cute, BUT I would recommend reviewing the fit chart and then still going up a size if you are close. I was right at the max hip width for a size large and when it arrived it was very tight across the hips. Had to return. Also in case it helps someone else, the fabric is very thin. If you don’t want to show your er, silhouette, you’ll want to layer something under it.
customer_reviews.author: cashburn77

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size based off the sizing chart. I’m usually a 4-6 so I ordered the small. The waist fit was fine, however, the bust was not. The bust was way to small for me. The material was thinner than I was expecting but the quality was nice. It’s a cute concept but it didn’t work for me. I returned the item. I decided not to go up in size bc I felt like if I did just for my chest the waist would be to loose and baggy. If you’re smaller chested I think this would be a great option for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sansone

customer_reviews.title: No good with my hips. Lol.
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews that said runs small so instead of L, got an XL. Still snug in the wrong places. I’m an hourglass L, almost 6 months pp. was hoping for cute dress/romper that I could nurse in but it’s just unflattering and tight in the wrong places. Would probably be really cute on a less curved shaped woman. On to find something else & get this returned!
customer_reviews.author: B. Henke

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’d say this is true to size but if you’re curvy you might want to size up. I’m generally a medium (5’4”, 145lb) and exchanged the medium for a large. It’s form fitting enough that the extra room was good for curves without being too large and baggy. It’s flattering and cool and breezy even though it’s not cotton (I live in south Florida so I’m sensitive to hot weather and “sticky” material). This is fine for that! 100% would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JFlower

customer_reviews.title: Company Hiding Their Mistake
customer_reviews.text: This product fit so well! The pattern was great. It looked so flattering until I noticed an extra tie in the front on one side. I reviewed the product and pictures of others in the romper and saw that both sides only tied ONCE. I untied the knot in the front and revealed that someone got lazy. The item was ripped so they took it upon themselves to tie it, thought I wouldn’t notice, and mailed it to me! Because I fight fare I’m sending their torn product back and asking for a replacement. Hopefully I’ll have good news when the new one comes in. I’ll keep everyone posted.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, cheap material.
customer_reviews.text: For the price and delivery, it’s pretty sheer. Good thing i ordered black, otherwise, it probably would be very sheer since it is cheap material. I think it was overpriced for The material used. It was a last minute purchase, but it was still cute. The ties wouldn’t stay tied, for some odd reason. I have muscular legs, so the glut part fit sort of snugly instead of loose. If I ordered a medium it would have been way too long. I’m 5’1”, 133lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: If you are on the fence, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumper! It’s well made and the material is very nice, especially for the price. It looks classy and can be dressed up or down with shoes and jewelry. The fit is also very flattering on my hour glass figure. I’m 5”8 168 pounds. I wear a medium to large top and a 10/12 in pants. The large fits me very well on the bottom. It’s a little loose on top, but can be adjusted with the straps. If you are on the fence, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Simone Wolff-Kenser

customer_reviews.title: Felt pretty, but is sheer
customer_reviews.text: I felt really pretty in this outfit and it was comfortable. I have a long torso, so finding jumpsuits that fit is not easy. The one real drawback I found that kept this from being a 5 star outfit is that it IS a bit sheer. Thankfully the pattern helps hide underwear. I do recommend wearing nude colored undergarments with this!
customer_reviews.author: Appabot

customer_reviews.title: Didn't look right on my kinda pear shaped body
customer_reviews.text: I guess maybe I've put on a few pounds but I usually wear a medium and I struggled to get this over my hips. Once I did it fit but not very flattering to my shape. I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: JLD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and picked the size accordingly. I'm 5'3 and 145lbs and ordered a medium. It fit perfectly. I love that it has pockets and the top straps tie so you can adjust the fit. I'm so happy with my purchase. I got a ton of compliments too when I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Feels like crepe paper
customer_reviews.text: The material is like crepe paper. One armpit hole was bigger than the other. And the static from the fabric was not fun. I loved it and wanted it to be so cute on me. But it just wasn’t. Bigger on the top and tight on my hips. I am about 5’5”-5’6” and about 185 and an XL fit and wasn’t too tight, but wasn’t flattering either. I am also very “hippy” so that may have been it too. I read reviews before purchasing and was hoping it would look cute, but no such luck!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ferdinandsen

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering
customer_reviews.text: Very flatting jumpsuit! I’m not completely in love with the synthetic/polyester type fabric, was hoping it would be cotton. But it’s comfortable and light fabric. Im very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K

customer_reviews.title: Really cute print
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the print on this, and it fit fine, honestly. I am 5'6, 175 and ordered the large. I could have been fine with the large but it hit me in the fattest part of my stomach and I felt like I had a giant kangaroo pouch, so I returned it. The material wasn't sheer but I wouldn't wear dark underwear with it. If you're on the fence about it, get it!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually very good quality and fit. I’m 5’8, 130 lbs got a medium fit perfectly. You tie the straps at the shoulders so that makes it more adjustable. The picture shows exactly what type of material it is, light and breathable but not see thru (I got the pink so I can’t say about white). Over all I’m pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for tall women
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit was VERY cute and was exactly as pictured. I am 6ft tall and decided to try it since I could return it for free if it didn’t work. Unfortunately it was too short in the torso section so I had to return it. Also, I bought the navy one and found it to be a bit sheer so I would be cautious with the lighter colored options.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a cave woman Halloween costume. Fit true to size and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and works for tall girls too!
customer_reviews.text: This is so flattering and it’s actually long enough! The ties on the straps make it super versatile. For reference, I’m 5’9, 150lbs and I purchased a large. The multi pattern is even prettier in person; I t’s going to be perfect for my upcoming trip to Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: AudreyJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and unique pattern
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the sizing is more US sizing and not Asian. I am 5'4 and 144 lbs and a Medium fit fine - it is a bit more form-fitting than the large, but I like the more streamlined look. The Large also fit just fine if I wanted a looser look, more like on most of the models. The chiffon fabric is a heavier chiffon and not see-through. The green leaf pattern is very unique. I love the large pattern and I like the leaf motif better than some of the large floral ones around.
customer_reviews.author: Wog1

customer_reviews.title: Flattering for all body shapes
customer_reviews.text: Fit great! I was prepared to be disappointed despite the positive reviews but this was a surprisingly good buy! Its flattering on most body shapes and the palm frond jungle pattern really flatters by hiding the post partum pooch. I’m 5’2 and 125lb and the longest part of the hem reaches right underneath my calf. I can actually just slide the straps off my shoulders to use the restroom w/o untying them.
customer_reviews.author: CloudRyder9

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is great quality, looks exactly like the picture, and is unbelievably comfortable. I am 5'10" and a size 12-14. I ordered the XL, and it fits great. Love it
customer_reviews.author: clhub

customer_reviews.title: Sexy fit
customer_reviews.text: I am curvy in my hips and thighs so I was a little worried about the fit when ordering. But although it's a little snug, it fits my curves well and is still comfortable. I bought the leaf pattern one so there is no see through and once I put my Spanx on everything looks great. My husband really liked it. FYI I usually wear a large top and xl or 16 bottoms. I ordered an XL.
customer_reviews.author: pinesfam

customer_reviews.title: Very unflattering...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the picture...was not cute at all. Didn't like it..would not buy again..will return...I ordered a size up and I am not a big girl by any means. I usually wear a medium and I sized up and it was not cute at all...it looked like I was wearing a tight bag with straps..it was hideous..
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy about this jumpsuit! I bought a large, I usually wear size 8 or 10 depending. I am 5’11 and rarely do I find a jumpsuit that fits me correctly. This one does and is so flattering! Made me feel thinner and a plus, has pockets!!!! I love it so much I’m going to buy a few more different colors for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: I'm with the other reviewer who said the fabric is kind of yucky-feeling- it's got a similar texture to crepe paper, so I'll probably wear it with nylon slip-shorts for more comfort when sitting. But it is gorgeous, the colors are bright, and it fits great. I have a forty inch waist, and the extra large fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: spinstapink

customer_reviews.title: Love it except the inseam could be longer and the hips were a little tight
customer_reviews.text: I sized up and it still was a little off. Although I made it work. I did get compliments. I'm tall so I liked the adjustable straps. I wear a size 6 and the L was a little tight on my hips, although not so tight that it was unwearable. I just like a curvier fit. I'll still keep and wear this jumpsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Gold Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great material, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I almost cancelled this order after I placed it and I’m SO glad I didn’t! I love it! It’s comfortable and light weight and I think very flattering on me. I am 5’4” a size 10/12 170 lbs and I ordered the large and it fits perfectly. I debated between a large and extra large. So the size chart is very accurate. I’m excited to eat this to a wedding in September! The one and only draw back is that it is very sheer so I’m afraid it might be see through I’m certain lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: ,The fabric was bad, itchy felt cheap, I normally wear a size 14 I figured this was Amazon so I could order bigger it was supposed to be a 16/18, I wanted this as a cover-up so I figured bigger would be OK. Way too small In the body and way too big on top. Ridiculous. Just bad all around. Sending it back in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: KWinn

customer_reviews.title: Great Jumpsuit!!
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is so cute!! The material is like crepe, so it hides wrinkles well for traveling. Also, the tied shoulders are ideal for various heights AND you can slide it down to use the bathroom without having to re-tie each time. I'm 5'10 160 and usually between a M and L and the Large fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: BELONGSCI Women Outfit Sleeveless Shoulder Bandage Waistband Sexy V-Neck Wide Leg Long Jumpsuit with Belt
feature_bullets: Features: adjustable shoulder bandage, sleeveless, waistband, V-neck, wide leg, long jumpsuit with belt, soft and attractive
Material: Woven Fabric dress:97% Polyester 3% Spandex, 100% Brand New, Soft Material
Occasion: Perfect outfit for casual, summer and autumn daily wear, beach, vacation, date, party, club, school etc.
Please refer to the Left Size Image before purchasing.
Attention:As different computer display colors are different, the color of the actual products may be slightly different from the above image. Thank you for your understanding.
